name: Light-Catching Highlighter Balm
about: What it is:A lightweight highlighter balm with golden, light-reflective minerals for a dewy natural glow in seconds..Highlighted Ingredients:- Baobab Seed Oil: Hydrates and nourishes skin..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Made in one universally flattering shade with a translucent base, this subtle highlighter gives your skin a dewy, natural-looking glow.
ingredients: -Baobab Seed Oil: Hydrates and nourishes skin...Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecanol, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Polybutene, Tridecyl.Trimellitate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide, Dibutyl.Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Adansonia Digitata Seed Oil, Calcium.Sodium Borosilicate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tin Oxide,.Tocopherol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).....The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Twist base and swipe or tap wherever you want a subtle glaze.
